DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , non-randomized trial evaluate post-operative health care resource utilization maxillary balloon antrostomy use FinESS Sinus Treatment physician 's office .
DOC.brief_title: RELIEF : Healthcase Utilization Outcomes FinESS Treatment Office
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , non-randomized trial evaluate post-operative health care resource utilization maxillary balloon antrostomy use FinESS Sinus Treatment physician 's office . Also demonstrate long term durability FinESS Sinus Treatment perform office setting .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Male Female subject Diagnosis rhinosinusitis ( CT radiographic evidence Medical Evaluation ) Willing comply ith protocol requirement Able provide consent Hemophilia Cystic Fibrosis Ciliary Dysfunction Severe septal deviation cause obstruction ostiomeatal unit Pregnant female
